name: Takeda Shin
description: Takeda Shin basically launched as a community project launched with the focus of celebrating modern day heroism, which has largely been overlooked in the society. Takeda uses a blockchain technology that gives room for implementation across diverse fields. Takeda harness features such as NFTs, Gaming, DAO and Metaverse operation for the creation of a gamified environment (metaverse) for its community. Earn with Takeda P2E blockchain games. Explore the VR world of Takeda heroes and a great experience.
